Posts.Content: My mother is a 5year survival breast cancer! She thanks God all the time, but she has one problem,  and that is her hair. Before cancer, her hair was long fine grey hair, she lost aall of her hair. Her hair is growing, but the top is still showing her scape! By the way, she is African American! Is there anything she can help the growing process go a little faster! Seeking any help we can get!
Posts.Title: My mother's grey hair!
